TopicTitle: Bacon Space Program / El-Cheapo Aerospace - on Haitus.

Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm the person behind the frankly quite ridiculous and random Bacon Space Program youtube channel, where I intended to showcase various never-flew-in-reality aircraft prototypes and chart down my own experiences in KSP as I went along.

Although I've played KSP for a long time I only started getting involved in the community in early 2015 after desiring a more open and mature sandbox gaming community; my Bacon Space Program existed in another form in a mobile sandbox game previously.

I have a number of video scripts and concepts that are weeks overdue and I shall just post WIP scripts and concepts below given sufficient proper motivation to do so. Below is one of my recent community-collaboration projects involving various members of the Church of Moar Booster parody facebook group.

For something space related, check out the

which concluded with a small scale test of a lunar cycler concept that was executed bass ackwards with spectacularly random results. It's not every day you see a space sheep

I recently embarked on a career change after about a year of working on IT certification and became the infamous character who knows nothing about computers * but deals with global severity incidents on a daily basis and making sure people in various IT related departments don't start murdering each other in the various medicial institutions in my care.

This means due to the need to stay one step ahead of events and look like I know something about computers (company sponsored training with free buffets? yay!), I rarely have time to play KSP except for those wonderful weekends like now where I can finally roost in my Fort of Pillows and browse the forums scheming for my next ridiculous contraption which may involve some form of flying pig and cosmic sheep.

Thus I shall open the floor to suggestions, criticism and all sorts of complaints - I am aware my camera skills are very rough and I don't seem to want to actually invest in any sort of video editing software, being el-cheapo and all. Indeed, most of my 0.90 creations were released on Reddit under the moniker "El Cheapo Aerospace"!

Here's an example of what El Cheapo Aerospace creates.

Or just have a showcase thread of my own that floats away into oblivion... at least I had the chance to actually do something KSP related after being buried in the IT crowd for weeks on end!

* - I actually know something about computers, having built gaming systems since the early 2000s. However, previous employers totally refused to develop that passion yet expect me to provide IT support and administrative services for free. These days, I tell them "revenge is a dish best served cold" but that's a tale for another time in an Asari club somewhere on the other side of the galaxy.
